forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 68. West wind around 20 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 11pm. Mostly clear, with a low around 60. West wind 12 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As twilight settles over Downtown San Francisco, the skies stretch unfettered with a warm embrace of clarity, the city bathed in the last golden hues before night fully descends. The forecast speaks of a sunny afternoon that has delivered its promise, reaching heights of 68, and now the warmth lingers gently as a cool breeze carries the whispers of a brewing ocean influence. Although the evening promises mostly clear skies, a slight chance of drizzle may usher in an unexpected freshness later tonight—a reminder of the region's ever-changing moods.

Dressed for this moment, light layers offer a comfortable balance against the increasingly cool air, while the brisk winds remind us of the city's maritime character. A walk along the Embarcadero could be pleasant; the marine layer, typical this time of year, will likely tease at the edges of the horizon, creating dramatic silhouettes against city lights. As night sets, consider seeking the intimacy of a cozy café, perhaps one with a window view, allowing the city’s vibrant heartbeat to accompany your evening pause.
